english.segment1: Noise makers signal the party that. silence has won. One love, one way, you're singing a song of pain
english.segment2: When God whispers your name. You say goodbye or welcome home
english.segment3: As far as I can see. I'm missing, I'm missing the words you say
english.segment4: Die trying! You're leaving in vain, you're quiet again. I'm lost in my sins, I need to escape..Save me!
english.segment5: Can you save me?. Now what good is a faith. when you live in silence?. And your works reveal hate, can you still claim you're safe?.
